snippet: Only one developer stepped forward with a proposal after Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo asked that bidding be reopened to bring a gambling center to the impoverished region.
abstract: New York State Gaming Facility Location Board recommends approval of gambling resort as expansion of Tioga Downs racetrack in Nichols, NY; prior rejection of casino proposal in state's economically depressed Southern Tier region had sparked political backlash against Gov Andrew M Cuomo.

byline.original: By CHARLES V. BAGLI and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: Only one developer stepped forward with a proposal after Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo asked that bidding be reopened to bring a gambling center to the impoverished region.

headline.main: Panel Backs Casino for Southern Tier Area of New York State
headline.print_headline: State Board Backs Casino After Rejecting Similar Bids
